GenAiFunction.description: This flow action can be used to create a new contact (if there is no contactId), Update a contact's details (if there is a contactId) or reset the contact's password (if there is a contactId and the customer requested it). When a new contact is created, newAccountInvitationUrl should be populated, the customer can then click this to finish setting up their new account and set a password. When resetting their password, the user will be sent an email with a reset password url, they can then use this to change their password.
GenAiFunction.masterLabel: AF - UAIS008 Create or Update Contact
